title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Foxhole’s Guns
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the weaponry of Foxhole, including the Aalto Storm Rifle, the Neville Anti-Tank Rifle, and a whole squadron of Storm Cannons.

title: Biggest Games Releasing In October 2022 - Gotham Knights, Call Of Duty, And Much More
description: The final quarter of the year is usually the busiest time on the gaming calendar, and 2022 isn't bucking that trend. Ahead of some massive releases in November and December, October is getting the party started with a collection of AAA heavyweights, quirky indie games, and some fascinating titles fighting for a spot this month. title: FIFA 23 Video Review
description: FIFA 23 makes incremental improvements to last year's game, but the looming presence of Ultimate Team's microtransactions cast a shadow over everything.
